page.title: 19 Life on a Farm
page.content:
Life on a farm is good fun and I often help my Dad. I pick eggs, take the dog for a walk and put straw in the sheds for the cattle. I play hide and seek with my brother in the straw but usually we get told not to. We are starting to make hay now and some farms are starting to cut the straw. I sometimes help my Dad to stack the straw.In the Autumn we plough the fields and plant some crops. In the Winter the fields are sprayed and get ready for the Spring.
We begin the holidays by picking up the hay and straw and maybe doing a bit of silaging and help to feed the cattle. When I help my Dad with the cattle I climb up on top of the straw stack and throw it down on the floor for bedding.
